column3:
(Dibrugarh East - 1. In order to lessen the water logging problem a total of 8 nos of dewatering pump is under operation at place like -
A. Phoolbagan (Phoolbagan pump)
B. Near DMC (DMC pump)
C. Graham bazar (Tinikunia pump)
D. Addl chief engg colony, WRD pump at Paltan Bazar
E. Water Resources mechanical pump near water resources Deptt. Paltan bazar
F. Garbage dumpyard pump at Maijan
G. Thakurbari pump at Maijan
H. Natun Gaon pump near Maijan
2. We are also collecting population affected families data to provide Gratuitous Relief.
3. To minimise the water logging problem of urban areas DMC and PWD continuously excavating the garbage and silt deposition which
blocking the flow of drain water.
Rescue - By sdrf
One Person namely Anjuri Gogoi age 74 years, was rescued by SDRF)
